entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is a spider who pauses when he hears that Hagrid has sent men into their hollow. He is described as an aged spider with clicking pincers.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is in trouble and has been taken to Azkaban by the school authorities who think he has set something on students.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is a place where Hagrid has been taken by the school authorities.

relationships.description: Aragog shows concern for Hagrid when he hears that he is in trouble.
Aragog knows that Hagrid has been taken to Azkaban.
